group.name: group_condition_filter

div.p: Warning: This feature is deprecated, because filters cannot handle NewId records that used during onchange computation.
Please, change this condition to use other types.

group.div: Here you can specify the filter for verification.

group.name: group_condition_condition
group.div: In that case you can select one of the already created conditions (this could be useful if you use the same condition but with inversion or as a superuser).

group.name: group_condition_eval
group.div: By this type you can describe the condition as an expression in the Python programming language.

The following variables are available:
obj - object that is checked
record - record of the object that is checked (same as obj)
env - environment
model - model
uid - current user id
user - current user
time - python module "time"
datetime - python module "datetime"
dateutil - python module "dateutil"
timezone - python module "timezone"

group.name: group_condition_group
group.div: With this type of condition you can use multiple conditions simultaneously.

group.name: group_condition_related_conditions
group.div: This type of condition is used to check the properties of related objects.

div.p: This type of condition refers to the current user and verifies whether the current user satisfies conditions.

ul.li: Field: Check if current user is present in field of object
One of: Check if current user is present in specified list of users
Checks: Check if current user satisfies specified conditions

group.name: group_condition_date_diff
group.div: This type of the condition allows you to estimate the date difference between certain events.

group.name: group_condition_simple_field
group.div: Here you can create a condition that relates to the simple field of the Odoo object.

group.name: group_condition_related_field
group.div: This type of condition applies to related fields.

group.name: group_condition_monetary_field
group.div: By this type you can create the condition to compare monetary indicators.

group.name: group_condition_find
group.div: This type of condition can be used to find related objects in arbitary table and check them.
